nodes.text: Voloren was a male agent of the Strategic Information Service of the Galactic Republic during the time of the Great Galactic War and the subsequent Cold War. In the course of his service, he was pursued by the Imperial officer Malavai Quinn. When he was about to arrest Voloren, he was ordered by his supervisor, Moff Broysc, to Druckenwell. Since the Moff ignored Quinn's information, the Republic agent escaped. Ten years later, however, Malavai managed to find Voloren again and had him brought into Imperial custody.
